mapper.insert: insert into ASSET_ALLOCATION_LIST (SERIALNO, RELATIVESERIALNO, PRODUCTCODE, PRODUCTDIMENSION, PROPORTION, INPUTDATE, UPDATEUSERID, UPDATEDATE, INPUTUSERID, INPUTORGID, UPDATEORGID, ASSETTYPE, EDUCATION, MINACCOUNT, MAXACCOUNT, LOANTERMUNIT, LOANTERM, REPAYMENTTYPE, APPLYORGID, CUSENTERPRISE, WORKCITY, HOUSECITY, CUSCLASSIFY, RISKGRADE, CUSENTERPRISETYPE, WORKCITYTYPE, HOUSECITYTYPE, WORKPROVINCE, HOUSEPROVINCE) values (#{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relativeSerialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productDimension,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{minAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loanTermUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loanTerm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repaymentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusEnterprise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusClassify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{riskGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusEnterpriseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workCityType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseCityType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ASSET_ALLOCATION_LIST set RELATIVESERIALNO = #{relativeSerialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTCODE = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTDIMENSION = #{productDimension,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROPORTION = #{proportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INPUTDATE = #{inputDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATEUSERID = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATEDATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INPUTUSERID = #{inputUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INPUTORGID = #{inputOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATEORGID = #{updateOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSETTYPE = #{assetType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EDUCATION = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MINACCOUNT = #{minAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAXACCOUNT = #{maxAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOANTERMUNIT = #{loanTermUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOANTERM = #{loanTerm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPAYMENTTYPE = #{repaymentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLYORGID = #{applyOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSENTERPRISE = #{cusEnterprise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORKCITY = #{workCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOUSECITY = #{houseCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSCLASSIFY = #{cusClassify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RISKGRADE = #{riskGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSENTERPRISETYPE = #{cusEnterpriseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORKCITYTYPE = #{workCityType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOUSECITYTYPE = #{houseCityType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORKPROVINCE = #{workProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOUSEPROVINCE = #{houseProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SERIALNO = #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SERIALNO, RELATIVESERIALNO, PRODUCTCODE, PRODUCTDIMENSION, PROPORTION, INPUTDATE, UPDATEUSERID, UPDATEDATE, INPUTUSERID, INPUTORGID, UPDATEORGID, ASSETTYPE, EDUCATION, MINACCOUNT, MAXACCOUNT, LOANTERMUNIT, LOANTERM, REPAYMENTTYPE, APPLYORGID, CUSENTERPRISE, WORKCITY, HOUSECITY, CUSCLASSIFY, RISKGRADE, CUSENTERPRISETYPE, WORKCITYTYPE, HOUSECITYTYPE, WORKPROVINCE, HOUSEPROVINCE from ASSET_ALLOCATION_LIST where SERIALNO = #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SERIALNO, RELATIVESERIALNO, PRODUCTCODE, PRODUCTDIMENSION, PROPORTION, INPUTDATE, UPDATEUSERID, UPDATEDATE, INPUTUSERID, INPUTORGID, UPDATEORGID, ASSETTYPE, EDUCATION, MINACCOUNT, MAXACCOUNT, LOANTERMUNIT, LOANTERM, REPAYMENTTYPE, APPLYORGID, CUSENTERPRISE, WORKCITY, HOUSECITY, CUSCLASSIFY, RISKGRADE, CUSENTERPRISETYPE, WORKCITYTYPE, HOUSECITYTYPE, WORKPROVINCE, HOUSEPROVINCE from ASSET_ALLOCATION_LIST
